SEND.LABEL: Faaigoa
SEND.LABELPLACEHOLDER: Ulufale mai se igoa mo lenei tuatusi e faʻaopopo i lau tusi faʻasalalauga
SEND.CUSTOMCHANGE: Faʻasologa o le suiga o le tulafono
SEND.INPUTLOCKED: Ua loka le faimalaga. O le ae manaomia le tatalaina o lenei saofaga e te faʻaalu ai.
SEND.ALERTFEECHANGECONTENT: O le totogi o fefaʻatauaiga moni e sili atu nai lo le mea e tatau ai Faʻamolemole faʻamaonia le totogi fou:

STAKING.STAKINGTITLE: Ua fai nei le ato tupe
STAKING.NOTENABLEDINFO: E le o mafai ona gasolo le taimi nei.
STAKING.NOTENABLEDINSTR: I le faʻasalalau o le ae manaomia e mafai ai ona faʻaauau le faʻatulagaina = 1 i lau faila metrix.conf.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGTITLE: Paʻu vaʻavaʻai e le o taofiofia
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINFO: O lau atotupe ua lokaina nei mo le taʻavale.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINSTR: E mafai ona e amataina e ala ile tatalaina o lau atotupe mo le taʻavale

MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: Leai se mea e maua i le Masternode. Mo le faʻatautaia o se Masternode i le lotoifale lafo atu saʻo 2,000,000 tupe i lau lauga Masternode ma faʻatali mo faʻamaoniga e 15.
MASTERNODES.ADDLOCAL: Faatulagaina le Masologa i le lotoifale
MASTERNODES.DISABLELOCAL: Faʻamā le Masternode i le lotoifale
MASTERNODES.LOCALNOTRUNNING: Fale puipui i le lotoifale E le o tamoe
MASTERNODES.REMOTENOTRUNNING: E leʻi Maua le Falepuipui Mamao

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: E mafai ona e sainia ni savali i au tuatusi e faʻamaonia ai oe lava ia. Faʻaeteete ia aua le sainia se mea leaga, ao osofaʻi mai le fatufatuina atonu e taumafai e faʻasesē oe i le sainia o lou faasinomaga ia i latou. Naʻo le faʻailoaina o faʻamatalaga auiliili uma e te malilie i ai.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Ulufale i totonu le tuatusi, savali (faʻamautinoa e te kopiina laina laina, avanoa, namu, ma isi mea faapena) ma le saini i lalo e faʻamaonia le feau. Faʻaeteete e le faitau atili i totonu o le saini nai lo le mea o loo i totonu o le savali na sainia lava ia, ina ia aloese mai le taufaasese i se osofaiga a tagata-i-le-va.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFYFAIL: Ua le manuia le faamaonia o le feau

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Faʻafeiloaʻi i le Metrix Core RPC faʻamafanafana. Fesoasoani faʻapitoa mo se aotelega o tulafono avanoa.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: FAʻAALIGA: Sa galulue malosi Scammers, taʻu atu i tagata faʻapipiʻi latou te lolomiina tulafono iinei, gaoi oa latou atotupe. Aua nei faʻaogaina lenei faʻamafanafanaga e aunoa ma le malamalama atoatoa i le faʻapipiʻiina o se poloaiga.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: O nei tulafono toe faaleleia e le mafai ona faimalaga pe a alu Metrix Core i fafo
REPAIR.INFO: O faʻamau i lalo o le a toe faʻafouina Metrix Core i laina o le tulafono e toe faaleleia ai le atotupe, faʻamautuina faafitauli ma faila faila polokacha poʻo fefaʻatauaʻiga e le o iai.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Taumafai e toe faʻaaogaina ia mea lilo mai le wallet.dat leaga.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Faʻamau le poloka poloka mo le fefaʻatauaiga o le atotupe.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapapallettxes = 1: Toe faʻaleleia galuega mai blockchain (faʻaauau faʻamatalaga-faʻamatalaga, faʻataʻitaʻiga)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zaparteteta = 2: Toe faʻaleleia galuega mai polokachain (tuʻu ifo tolu-faʻamaumauga)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETBUTTON: Faaleleia le faatulagaga o le atotupe
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -upgradewallet: Faaleleia le atotupe i le faiga fou i luga o le amataga. (Manatua: e le o se faʻafouga o le atotupe lava ia!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Fausia le lisi polokachain mai faila o le blk000 'dat now.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Faʻafeiloaʻi Metrix blockchain faila mai metrixcoin.com ma bootstrap lau faʻatulagaga. Faʻalagolago i lau fesoʻotaiga fesoʻotaʻiga e mafai ona ave le 10 minute i ni nai itula
REPAIR.SYNCFROMSTARTINFO: Aveese au faila poloka polokala ma resync mai le poloka genesis.

NETWORK.PROXYTOR: Faʻaaoga le SOCKS5 vavalalata vavalalata e oʻo atu ai i paaga e ala i le faʻamalologaina o auaunaga

PROMPT.UNLOCKSTAKINGONLY: Tatala mo na o le taofiofi
PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: O loʻo maua se faʻamatalaga mo Metrix Core. E te manaʻo e faʻapipiʻi nei?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: E maua se faʻafouga mo Altitude. E te manaʻo e sii i ai nei?
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: Ua leiloa le sootaga ia Metrix Core. E mafai ona e taofi le atotupe pe amata Metrix Core totonu.
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Soo se faʻamaumauga muamua na e faia mai lau faila faila e tatau ona suia i le faila fou faila, faʻailoga faila. Mo faʻamatalaga saogalemu, o faʻamaumauga muamua o le faila pusa e le faʻapipiʻi o le a faʻaaogaina pe a amata ona e faʻaaoga le atotupe fou, faʻailoga.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Sa i ai se faafitauli ia Metrix Core na mafua ai ona faamutaina. O le fautuaga e siaki lau debug.log file mo mataupu.
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGINFO: O lou metrix.conf o loʻo i ai se faʻatonuina o le masternode setup lea o le a mafua ai ona alu vave Metrix Core. Faamolemole siaki lenei faila.
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDINFO: Sa i ai se faʻafitauli o le amataina o le Metrix Core. O le pepa faataga e siaki ai lau faila o le Altitude log mo faafitauli.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Tusi Resitala
ADDRESSBOOK.SENDINGINFO: O lau faʻasalalauga Metrix na e faʻasaoina mo le totogiina o tupe totogi. Siaki i taimi uma le aofaiga ma le mauaina o le tuatusi aʻo leʻi tuʻuina atu tupe siliva
ADDRESSBOOK.RECEIVINGINFO: O lau faʻasalalauga Metrix na e faʻaagaga mo le totogiina o tupe totogi.

MAINCHAINCHECK.ALERT: Lapataiga! E te le oi luga ole filifili autu e tusa ai ma le tagata suʻesuʻe Metrix. E sili atu le fautuaina e toe faʻatasia pe toe faʻafouina lau poloka poloka e aloese mai le leiloa o soʻo se tupe siliva.

NOTIFICATIONS.PASSPHRASEMISMATCH: O fasifuaitau na e ulufale ai e le tutusa
NOTIFICATIONS.CHECKINGUPDATEFAILED: Le mafai ona siaki mo le faʻafouina. Siaki lau fesoʻotaiga.
NOTIFICATIONS.SENDINGEXCEEDSBALANCE: Ole aofaiga o loʻo e lafoina e sili atu nai lo lau paleni filifilia

NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGDESTINATIONADDRESS: E tatau ona e faʻamaonia se tuatusi o le destination
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGAMOUNTTOSEND: E tatau ona e faʻamaonia se aofaiga e lafo
NOTIFICATIONS.INSUFFICIENTBALANCE: Paleni le lava e filifilia e faʻatumu ai lenei fefaʻatauaiga
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONSENT: Gaoioiga na auina atu ma le manuia
NOTIFICATIONS.GENERICERROR: Ua i ai se mea le iloa. Atonu e te manaʻomia le toe toe tatalaina lau atotupe ma toe taumafai. Afai o faʻafitauli faʻafesoʻotaʻi faʻafesoʻotaʻi le lagolago
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONMISMATCH: Faʻasalaga o fefaʻatauaiga. Faamolemole toe taumafai.
NOTIFICATIONS.MINIMUMCONFIRMATIONS: O mea uma e manaʻomia e le itiiti ifo i le 1 faʻamaoniga ao leʻi faʻaaluina.
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONSCOPIEDCLIPBOARD: Faʻasalaga gaosi i luga o le laupapa
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONOUTPUTTOOLARGE: O se tasi o lau totogi ile aofaiga e telē tele e auina atu ma le saogalemu. Ole maualuga ole 90,071,992.54740992.
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONCHANGETOOLARGE: O lau suiga e telē tele e auina atu saogalemu. Ole maualuga ole 90,071,992.54740992.
NOTIFICATIONS.FAILEDTOWRITECONFIG: Sa i ai se faʻafitauli e tusi i lau faila file metrix.conf. Siaki le faila ma o Altitude o tusi tusitusi.
NOTIFICATIONS.NOPUBLICUP: Leai se tuatusi IP a le malo na maua. Siaki lau fesoʻotaiga i luga ole initaneti ma toe amata Altitude.
NOTIFICATIONS.CONFIGURINGLOCALMN: Faʻasaʻo le Masternode i le lotoifale...

HOME.INFOLINE1: O le taimi lava e te maua ai se tuatusi a le BTC soʻo se BTC auina atu i lena tuatusi o le a otometi lava ona vavaeina mo le MRX i totonu o lau tuatusi MRX.
HOME.INFOLINE2-1: Gaoioiga e masani ona manino i totonu o le itula e faalagolago i taimi Bitcoin poloka. E mafai ona tatou talia le tele o mea
HOME.INFOLINE2-3: O lenei mea o le a faaliliuina i le BTC muamua ona MRX.
HOME.INFOLINE3: A maeʻa loa ona faʻamaonia lau BTC, e te maua lau MRX i lau tuatusi filifilia.
HOME.FIATSWAPSELECTED: O le a tuʻuina atu oe i le Buy.Metrixcoin.com e faʻauma ai lenei fefaʻatauaiga

NOTIFICATIONS.ALREADYHAVEADDRESS: Ua i ai sau tuatusi BTC e fesootaʻi ma lenei tuatusi Metrix

NOTIFICATIONS.SWAPUSDMAX: O le maualuga o le $ swap USD e $ 3000
